actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on HELP.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend certain programs under the authority of the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Service Administration, and for other purposes.
short_title: Wrap Around Services for Detained or Incarcerated Youth Act of 1999
subjects: Federal aid to child health services
Federal aid to substance abuse programs

summary.text: Wrap Around Services for Detained or Incarcerated Youth Act of 1999 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to award grants on a competitive basis to enable State or local juvenile justice agencies to provide aftercare services for youth offenders discharged from facilities in the juvenile or criminal justice system who have serious emotional disturbances or are at risk of developing them. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: Wrap Around Services for Detained or Incarcerated Youth Act of 1999

A bill to amend title V of the Public Health Service Act to revise and extend certain programs under the authority of the Substance Abuse and Mental Health Service Administration, and for other purposes.
